q: What is this game? What is Corporate Clash?
a: Corporate Clash is a completely free-to-play fan-hosted recreation of [Disney's Toontown Online](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Toontown_Online). The game was shut down by Disney in 2013 with tens of thousands of players still interested in the game, and our goal is to bring back its legacy while adding new content to the game that has been requested by players for years.
To play the game, simply create an account and head to the play page to get started! Flippy, the mayor of Toontown, will be your tour guide and will teach you how to play.

q: How is Corporate Clash different from Toontown Online and other fan-made projects?
a: Corporate Clash is a complete overhaul of Toontown Online. With brand new Toon species, Gag tracks, ToonTasks, and Cogs, Corporate Clash brings an experience like no other Toontown project! You can view our [recent changelogs](https://corporateclash.net/releases) to get a full list of our greatest features.

q: Do I have to purchase or pay to play?
a: Although we're legally a non-profit and tax exempt, we do not make money or have an income stream from our playerbase, ads, or otherwise. The game is and will always be completely free to play.

q: Can I donate for server costs?
a: We love how much you like to play Corporate Clash, however, we do not accept donations. If you want to support us, simply share our website link or recommend us to your friends!

ToonStep is our two-factor authentication system that requires you to verify new logins coming from a different location. Enabling ToonStep is highly recommended for the safety of your account and will only allow authorized users to access your account.‚Äù

q: I'm having trouble registering or logging into my account! What do I do?!
a: The login page should include some error information if you have issues with it. Otherwise, shoot us an email at [support@corporateclash.net](mailto:support@corporateclash.net) to recieve assistance from one of our support Toons!
